mapper.select: SELECT member_id memberId, name, email, nickname, postcode, phone FROM Member ORDER BY create_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET member_id = #{memberId}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, postcode = #{postcode}, phone = #{phone} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.donation_id donationId, d.title, m.nickname, d.expired, d.enable FROM Donation d LEFT JOIN Member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY enable ASC
SELECT m.meeting_id, m.title, mem.nickname, m.start_date, m.end_date FROM Meeting m LEFT JOIN Member mem ON m.member_id = mem.member_id ORDER BY m.meeting_id DESC

SELECT m.market_id, m.member_id, m.title, m.product_name, m.price, f.file thumbNailImage, COUNT(f.market_id) hasFile FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id GROUP BY m.market_id ORDER BY m.market_id DESC
SELECT market_id, member_id, title, content, inserted, price, product_name, total, enable FROM Market WHERE market_id = #{market_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Market (member_id, title, content, price, product_name) VALUES(#{member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{product_name})
mapper.select: SELECT question_id, member_id, title, content, inserted, email FROM Faq ORDER BY question_id
